message.name: ERR_LEGALACTION_FV_END_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_START_DATE
message.locale: End Date should not be earlier than Start Date.

message.name: ERR_LEGALACTION_FV_START_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: Start Date should not be earlier than current date.

message.name: ERR_LEGALACTION_XRV_SAME_PARTICIPANT_RESPONDENT
message.locale: Same person can not be participant as well as respondent.

message.name: ERR_LEGALACTION_FV_NO_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: At least one participant must be selected.

message.name: ERR_LEGALACTION_XRV_CANNOT_ADD_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: Active legal action already exists for %1s.

message.name: ERR_LEGALACTION_XRV_PENDING_HEARING_EXISTS
message.locale: Legal action can not be completed as pending hearing exists for this legal action case.

message.name: ERR_LEGALACTION_FV_START_DATE_GREATER_DECISION_DATE
message.locale: The Decision Date, %1s, must be on or after the Legal Action Start Date, %2s.

message.name: ERR_LEGALACTION_REGISTRAR_INCORRECT_BPOCLASS
message.locale: Business Process class %1s must implement the interface %2s.

message.name: ERR_LEGALACTION_REGISTRAR_NEW_INSTANCE_UNIMPLEMENTED
message.locale: Factory class %1s does not implement newInstance method.

message.name: ERR_LEGALACTION_REGISTRAR_ISSUE
message.locale: Exception occurred while creating the Legal Action Hook Registrar.

message.name: ERR_LEGALACTION_XRV_CANNOT_CREATE_FOR_CLOSED_CASE
message.locale: Legal action can not be created for %1s case.

message.name: ERR_LEGALACTION_FV_START_DATE_NOT_BE_FUTURE
message.locale: Legal Action Start Date must not be future Date.

message.name: ERR_LEGALACTION_XFV_EXPECTEDENDDATE_NOTBE_EARLIER_THAN_STARTDATE
message.locale: Legal Action Expected End Date must not be earlier than Start Date.

message.name: ERR_LEGALACTION_XFV_EXPECTEDENDDATE_NOTBE_EARLIER_THAN_EFFETIVECDATE
message.locale: Legal Action Expected End Date must not be earlier than Effective Date.
